alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 19 at 8:57PM AKDT until May 20 at 1:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKDT SATURDAY FOR DELTANA AND TANANA FLATS... * AFFECTED AREA...Deltana and Tanana Flats. * TIMING...Until 1 AM AKDT Saturday. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. Relative humidities will only recover to around 50 percent on Friday night from Delta Junction south. * TEMPERATURES...Around 60. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires are possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
